content: the legs and feet lightly with yarn endings plus a little toy filling if cut yarn thread end through all 4 right foot sole sts pull up tight you think it needs it flatten the sole with your fingers to shape to gather the sts secure the end carefully over-sew around the shoulder/ thigh so joining to the body then lift up the leg and join the cast-on edge near the body breast/ belly to complete the joining to the body see fig 20 join as dotted lines & fig 21 baby rhino page 32 baby rhino page 33 fig 19 fig 20 fig 21 tail row 6 decrease k2tog the tail is knitted separately and then joined onto the body fasten_off for tail point with yarn a cast on 6 sts join tail seam row 1 3 & 5 purl join seam along row ends row 2 decrease k2tog k2 k2tog - 4sts join the tail cast-on edge to the baby rhino s bottom row 4 decrease k2tog twice - 2sts see fig 21 the tail isn t stuffed note if there is any part of this pattern that you do not understand then please feel free to email me claire garland@btopenworld com to see more patterns and details on how to receive a free knitting pattern every other month follow along with @dotpebbles_knits https //www instagram com and #imadethisrabbit page on facebook
